channel.title: PnP PowerShell on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PnP PowerShell on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: PnP PowerShell v1.10
item.description: PnP PowerShell is a cross-platform PowerShell Module providing over 600 cmdlets that work with Microsoft 365 environments and more specifically SharePoint Online, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Flow.

item.title: How to use oh-my-posh with PnPPowerShell
PnP PowerShell to manage list designs and create lists/libraries using list designs
item.description: PnP PowerShell has a set of cmdlets to manage custom list templates.
